website_summaries.verdict: The Asics International Lyte is a popular model that has been released multiple times over the years. Because of this, the shoe already has a following who did not hesitate to get a pair when it was relaunched. It brings with it a reliable ankle hold that helps users stand their ground. Furthermore, it is light, flexible, and grippy on the mat because of its split-sole unit.
pros: A majority of the reviewers are impressed that the Asics International Lyte is as comfortable as the original version released decades ago
The length and the width of this Asics wrestling shoe are considered true to the brand’s measurement scheme by almost all of the owners
Multiple shoppers mention that based on the quality and performance of the trainer, it is worth the price
The flat and thin sole unit has given a lot of athletes better ground feedback as well as traction
More than a few folks have been surprised that this footgear offers some arch support
Several purchasers note that they have found the style and colorways of this product to be attractive
cons: Some wrestlers criticize the ankle support on this pair of wrestling shoes because they have to tie the laces really tight to achieve proper hold
A few users were disgruntled with the durability because after a few weeks of use, the sole peeled off and the upper tore

customer_reviews.title: Great wrestling shoes and very quick to respond and help ...
customer_reviews.text: Great wrestling shoes and very quick to respond and help with sizing. Love these shoes. I’ve used lots of wrestling shoes for competing, practice, or just teaching a clinic. These are very versatile and super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: sobhan Namvar

customer_reviews.title: A little tight out of the box, wear them in gradually.
customer_reviews.text: I received these yesterday, and wore them today. I like the style, and I'm sure I will like the fit, but would recommend they be loosely laced out of the box. They were a bit tight for me near my instep.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cavin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is actually one of best shoes I wore. I had original OG lyte and those were great so I was hoping this shoes is same and it was. Comfortable, get a good grip, and flexible while wrestling. One down side is that it’s very narrow and hurts your feet first two three practices. After that it fits better like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Julian purney

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes are just like this
customer_reviews.text: My Picney love this shoe! He got his 100th win in them and broke his schools all-time carreer wins record in them😁 proud parent moment! Hahaha
customer_reviews.author: WILL W.

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: These are a throw back from the 90's. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Matrat

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes at a reasonable price!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes! Very fast shipping! After a lot of browsing, I am so glad I found this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Kande

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great. I am planning on wearing them for Krav Maga. I’ll see how they hold up
customer_reviews.author: brant timberlake

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this shoe, bought it for boxing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tread is gone in less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: We bought these shoes in 3 months ago and the tread in the bottom of the shoes are absolutely gone with no over usage. We are back to getting the aggressors. A waste of money. I am sorry, we really wanted to like these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE RETRO WRESTLING SHOES!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them - exactly what he wanted - can't wait til they're broken in so he can wear them!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: I would like to try these out!
customer_reviews.text: Hi guys, I own a wrestling beginner guide on YouTube, and would like to ask if you guys could send me a sample to test out for my viewers. For my Mat Traction Video I want to compare the 2 most high end shoes from Asics , Nike and Adidas. Im just trying to help out people looking to spend the money, because It sure would've helped me!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Michele F.

product_meta.title: Asics Unisex-Adult International Lyte Shoes
product_meta.description:
REISSUED FOR 2017!

These are in stock ready to ship. If you don't see a size we are sold out in it. Several sizes are going to be hard to find shortly. Don't wait in particular for 8.5 to 9.5, we are predicting we did not buy enough of those sizes. 9.0 ad 9.5 are sold out at ASICS until 10/1 or so. Don't wait if you want these for Fargo or a Summer Camp.

The ASICS International Lyte shows why ASICS has been a constant on the mat. With the attention to detail and high quality, this is the shoe for all your serious wrestlers.

The International Lyte is ultra-lightweight and has the popular split sole for optimum flexibility, super suede for durabilty and comfort and the MONO SOCK Fit system for a "sock-like" fit.

Features:

 * Super Suede Ecsaine
 * MONO-SOCK Fit System
 * Weight 8.3 oz.

We want your shoes to fit the way you want them to fit. So we have our "Buy Wrestling Shoes Worry Free" program that provides one free exchange for sizing changes (see website for details).

We typically recommend adding 1/2 size to your normal gym shoe or sneaker size shoe. For example, if you are a size 9.0 gym shoe, order a size 9.5 in these shoes. We find that allows a little room in the toe for comfort and or growth.
feature_bullets: MONO-SOCK Technology Fit System - An elastic internal sleeve which replaces a traditional tongue providing a "sock-like" fit.
